mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_information(PETINF_ID, MEMBER_ID, SPECIES_ID, PETGEN_ID, PETNAME, PETAGE) VALUES(#{PETINF_ID}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{SPECIES_ID}, #{PETGEN_ID}, #{PETNAME}, #{PETAGE});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pet_information INNER JOIN species ON pet_information.SPECIES_ID = species.SPECIES_ID INNER JOIN pet_gender ON pet_information.PETGEN_ID = pet_gender.PETGEN_ID AND MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
